message: Looking for a few brave souls to test drive our new platform.  Our product is designed to replace wikis for teams < 50 (perfect if you're a dev team, consultancy, etc).  If interested, drop me a line at euwyn@opzi.com or fill out the form - https://opzi.wufoo.com/forms/opzi-beta-access/
